creditline: Bequest from the Karen Daniels Petersen American Indian Collection
description: portrait of a man in near profile, with head turned to PR; man has white hair and long white beard; pince-nez glasses on a cord around his neck, tucked into his upper jacket pocket
inscription:
Inscription 

below image on mount, in gold: [Burnham, Faribault, Minn.]; on back of mount, in pencil: [Dr. Jared Waldo Daniels, brother/ of Dr. A.W. Daniels]
title: Portrait of Dr. Jared Waldo Daniels
